column5: Just wondering what is your favorite/most successful way of catching 'eyes while in Canada.My favorite is using a slip bobber and a nice rainbow minnow or bouncing Rapala's on a three way.What is your favorite?
My favorite is an in-line spinner with a large colorado blade and either a nightcrawler or a big minnow on it. Right behind this rig would be a jig and twister tail combo.
